title: Passerelle
copy: Please fill out our inquiry form to learn more about rental opportunities.   Available Friday–Wednesday, 6:00–11:30 p.m. Capacity: 200 reception style An intimate yet airy space, the Passerelle is located on the second floor of the Modern Wing. Overlooking Griffin Court, it features views of Pritzker Garden and is conveniently located adjacent to the galleries of contemporary art. This lofted space provides the perfect location for an evening reception.
